title: AI Assistant with GPT-NLP Integration
desc: An AI assistant project that leverages the analytical power of GPT models within the realm of Natural Language Processing. Aimed at creating seamless human-computer interactions, this platform showcases the integration of conversational AI with NLP for enhanced user experiences.

title: Refining Matrix Multiplication by Natural Parallelism
desc: Optimizing matrix multiplication efficiency through natural parallelism by leveraging advanced memory management, data-level parallelism with SIMD, and multi-threading with OpenMP and MPI to enhance computational speed and scalability.

title: Image Processing by Natural Parallelism
desc: An advanced exploration of image processing utilizing the power of natural parallelism. Designed to enhance computational efficiency, showcasing the potential of parallel techniques in real-world applications.

title: Personal Website
desc: My website featuring insightful blogs and a portfolio of my projects.

title: Banking Database
desc: A design and implementation of comprehensive banking database. Built using SQL, Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: K-means Clustering
desc: An implementation of unsupervised learning algorithm: K-means Clustering. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Handwritten Digit Recognition
desc: An application of Multilayer Perceptron on recognizing ten thousands of handwritten digits. Built using Python.

title: LDAPS Model Forecast Prediction
desc: A simple application of linear regression on predicting next-day temperature. Built using Python.

title: Email Spam Classification
desc: A machine learning model designed to classify emails as either spam or legitimate. Achieved an accuracy of 85.7%. Built using Python.

title: Color Snake
desc: A Snake game with an AI Monster feature. Built using Python.
